articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Unryul Mine
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Unryul Mine
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Unryul Mine.
					 Going round stope, dressing plant and other places, he learned in detail about production, the prospect of mining and earth removal.    Then he convened a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting took measures for increasing the production of ores, directing efforts to earth removal and raising the metal contents of concentrated ore.
					
					 Meanwhile, the premier learned about the production of the Jaeryong Mine and took a measure for supplying electricity.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Russian Political Parties, Organization and Figure
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Russian Political Parties, Organization and Figure
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were placed before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday on the occasion of the third anniversary of Kim Jong Il's demise. They were sent by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Central Council of the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union in their joint name, the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia and member of the State Duma of Russia Josif Kobzon, who is People's Artist of the Soviet Union.

articles.title: Ceremony of Naming Class after Kim Jong Il Held at Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten
articles.content:
Ceremony of Naming Class after Kim Jong Il Held at Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of naming a class of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten after Kim Jong Il took place on December 4.
					 Displayed on the front wall of the venue was a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten, the masses, the DPRK ambassador to Vietnam, his embassy officials and a friendship delegation led by the chairman of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets before the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and paid respect for him.
					
					 The chairperson of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association said in a speech: 
					
					 It is an event of important significance in glorifying the immortal feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He was the great leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state and the people of the DPRK and a close friend of the Vietnamese people.
					
					 It is a significant event that the class named after Kim Jong Il was organized in the wake of that named after Kim Il Sung at Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten.
					
					 Its purpose is to let new generations of Vietnam learn after Kim Jong Il and contribute to the development of friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 An art performance was given by kindergarteners at the event.

articles.title: Seminar on Space Science and Technology Held
articles.content:
Seminar on Space Science and Technology Held
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar on space science and technology at Kim Il Sung University on Wednesday.
					 Present there were officials, scientists, technicians and teachers of the National Aerospace Development Administration, State Academy of Sciences, Academy of Social Sciences, Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications, Ministry of Fisheries, Hydro-meteorological Service and other units.
					
					 The purpose of the seminar was to develop the space science and technology of the country onto a higher level at an early date through the presentation of papers and scientific interchanges of basic theories and applied science related to the space science and technology including the technology of manufacturing and launching satellites and carrier rockets.
					
					 Hundreds of papers were presented to the seminar by units in the field of scientific research and education, commissions, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Among them were papers comprehensively dealing with the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed for the development of space science of the country and the validity of the Workers' Party of Korea's space development policy and those explaining from a legal point of view the legitimacy of the DPRK's space development for peaceful purposes.
					
					 Some papers dealt in a scientific and theoretical manner with issues arising in developing satellite carrier rockets, earth observation satellites and working communications satellites.
					
					 Dozens of papers were highly appreciated there for their weighty significance in settling the urgent issues in the field of space science and technology.

articles.title: Sci-tech Achievements Made by University of Architecture
articles.content:
Sci-tech Achievements Made by University of Architecture
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang University of Architecture in the DPRK has made hundreds of sci-tech achievements this year, which have proved effective after their application.
					 Among achievements are those of ensuring the stability of roadbed and trackbed along the Chongchon River as well as solving problems arising in building dam and coating waterway tunnel, which are conducive to the construction of power stations in tiers on the river.
					
					 Teachers and researchers of the university invented computer control vibration meter for ensuring the safety of structures, developed an agent for hardening earth of roadbed and prepared turf nutrients.
					
					 They also succeeded in developing the method of producing welding wire with dead-melted steel.

articles.title: New Water Purifier Developed
articles.content:
New Water Purifier Developed
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The Bioengineering Branch under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has recently developed a new water purifier. 
					 The purifier is an environment-friendly one as it consists of beneficial active microorganisms, over 20 kinds of microelements and some rare-earth elements.
					
					 It is very effective in clearing off different water pollutants like nitrite and organic waste while containing the propagation of pathogenic bacterium.
					
					 It has been applied to the aquarium of the Central Zoo, Rungna Dolphinarium and other units.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 9 Published
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 9 Published
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 9 was brought out by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House. It is a library of the Juche idea and the Songun idea which deals with his works in a chronological order.
					 It contains 111 works published by leader Kim Jong Il from July, Juche 54 (1965) to May, Juche 56 (1967).
					
					 In the works including "On Establishing the Party's Monolithic Ideological System in the Field of Literature and Arts" he underscored the need to ensure literary and art works depicting President Kim Il Sung at the highest level.
					
					 In various works he indicated tasks and ways for further strengthening the People's Army and bolstering up its combat capability as required by a modern war and getting militia forces fully ready for combat.
					
					 The book contains works which clarify principled issues arising in educating students including an issue of building well the ranks of teachers and raising their qualifications.
					
					 In the works including "The Democratic National Rights of Our Compatriots in Japan Must Be Completely Guaranteed" he set forth tasks of the struggle for training the Korean school youth and children in Japan as reliable successors to the revolution and defending the democratic national rights of compatriots in Japan.
					
					 Contained in the book are works giving answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in the socialist construction including the issue of boosting the agricultural production and improving the commodity supply and the matter of protecting forests, managing streets and villages in a hygienic and cultured manner and preserving and managing the historic remains and relics.

articles.title: U.S. Should Be Brought to Human Rights Court: Scholar
articles.content:
U.S. Should Be Brought to Human Rights Court: Scholar
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- It is 66 years after the adoption of the World Declaration of Human Rights, but mankind's desire to enjoy genuine rights has not yet been realized due to the arbitrary practices of the United States.
					 In this regard, Dr. Jong Song Su of Kim Il Sung University told KCNA:
					
					 The Declaration was adopted at the 3rd UN General Assembly on Dec. 10, 1948, which gave many peoples of the world the hope that they would lead a genuine life with independent rights and dignity.
					
					 So, the world people have marked this day as World Day of Human Rights every year.
					
					 But, at present the practical and urgent problems for human independence are disregarded and the human rights is still abused as the U.S.' political plaything and means for intervention.
					
					 Historically, the U.S. has persistently pulled up those countries standing for independence over the human rights issue while zealously defending its allies.
					
					 Styling itself an "international judge", it annually issues a "report on human rights performance" based on dogmatism and biased and groundless accusations to intervene in other countries' internal affairs and put pressure on them.
					
					 It is well-known among the world people that the U.S. has committed maltreatment, brutal tortures and other atrocities against the prisoners in its secret jails established across the world.
					
					 The U.S. intensifies the pressure, sanctions and military blackmail against other nations under the pretext of "human rights issue" only to attain its ulterior political purposes, but such moves are rejected worldwide.
					
					 Its intervention, aggression, sanctions and pressure can never break the desire and will of the world people to defend their rights for independence.
					
					 The world people should bring the U.S., the worst human rights abuser, to the international human rights court at once.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on U.S. Racial Discrimination Policy
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on U.S. Racial Discrimination Policy
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Missouri State judicial authorities of the U.S. recently decided not to indict a white policeman who shot a young black man to death in Ferguson City in August.
					 This clearly shows that the U.S. trumpeting about "protection of human rights" and "equality for all" is no more than human rights tundra and the worst country torn with racial discrimination.
					
					 Racial discrimination has reached a systematic and wide-ranging and extremely grave phase in the U.S.
					
					 The blacks in the U.S. are deprived of political rights and subject to poverty, maltreatment and contempt and seized with fear of being shot to death any time.
					
					 Ceaseless shooting sprees against them are hideous human rights abuses caused by the U.S. authorities.
					
					 They are beaten and fall victim to the arbitrary practices of policemen in broad daylight at the tacit connivance of the authorities.
					
					 Demonstrations protesting against the racial discrimination policy of the authorities have been staged in more than 170 cities across the U.S. with the case in Ferguson City as a momentum. Against this backdrop a policeman shot a young black man to death in other city.  These atrocities are a black hunt of modern version from A to Z.
					
					 In dealing with murder cases caused by the excessive use of force, most of the policemen involved in those crimes are allowed to go unpunished.
					
					 Obama, a black man who came to power for raising the settlement of issue of racial inequality as his election commitment, let loose a spate of irresponsible remarks that the U.S. is a country built by law and it is necessary to accept the decision of the judicial authorities. This goes to prove that the racial discrimination policy will never change in the U.S. styling itself a "human rights protector" no matter how frequently its president is replaced by another.
					
					 The incident in Ferguson City is making a rupture in "proactive human rights diplomacy" of the U.S. which is putting forward as its main diplomatic goal to "spread the view on human rights and democracy."
					
					 On Nov. 28 the UN Anti-Torture Committee called for thorough investigation into excessive counteraction of the police against minorities and abuse of power.
					
					 It is quite natural that the serious issue of racial discrimination in the U.S. draws public criticism in the international arena.
					
					 However, the U.S. government is refusing to take any countermeasure against racial discrimination such as the incident in Ferguson City.
					
					 Such incident will never be stopped in the U.S. as its human rights system is beset with serious problems and racial discrimination is deeply rooted in its society.
					
					 The great irony is that the U.S. dares brand those countries preserving the system and political mode peculiar to them as "human rights abusers", forgetting its awkward position as the worst human rights abuser and kingpin of racial discrimination.
					
					 The U.S. had better honestly lend its ear to the international community's criticism and settle its own human rights issue.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Thoroughly Embodying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Thoroughly Embodying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- It is bounden duty and revolutionary moral obligation of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to thoroughly embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an editorial.
					 For the prosperity of my country -- this was his lifelong patriotic creed and constant view, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The past three years since his demise have been characterized by epoch-making events demonstrating the might of the country. This was possible as all the service personnel and people have cherished Kim Jong Il's patriotism deep in their mind.
					
					 The intense loyalty of the scientists to implement without fail the patriotic behest of him to glorify the country as a space power brought about such a miracle as the successful launch of Kwangmyongsong 3-2 in snowy December.
					
					 The history of his ceaseless inspections of outposts standing guard over the country in the death-defying spirit was cherished deep in the mind of the service personnel, which turned the whole army into a-match-for-a-hundred army capable of fighting an actual war.
					
					 The advantages and might of Korean style socialism that others can neither have nor imitate have been given the fullest play in all fields of the drive for a great upswing, and successes of pushing back frontiers of the latest science and epoch-making examples representing the development of the country were registered.
					
					 This is a result of the development of the patriotic spirit of Kim Jong Il into the all-people spirit.
					
					 As all the service personnel and people work hard by learning from his patriotism and step up the nation-wide advance to attain new goals, uninterrupted epoch-making innovations will be made on all fronts of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Blowing up Bases for Anti-DPRK Psychological Warfare in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Blowing up Bases for Anti-DPRK Psychological Warfare in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces showed more exceptional zeal in joining the U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" offensive than any other allies, revealing its true colors as traitors and confrontation maniacs.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					
					 Lurking behind this is the aim to tarnish the high prestige and ward off the influence of the DPRK, justify their policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and divert elsewhere the public opinion in a bid to calm down the public resentment and tide over their ruling crisis, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 They are getting frantic in their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket and psychological warfare in a bid to carry out their sinister scenario, driving the inter-Korean relations to total catastrophe and pushing the situation to the brink of a war. This is a very serious development.
					
					 Their reckless provocation is seriously hurting the dignity and self-respect of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 It is a clear-cut answer and final choice of all servicepersons and people of the DPRK to deal merciless blows at those who were involved in the anti-DPRK "human rights" offensive and psychological warfare and blow up all bases of the puppet forces for hatching sinister plots.
					
					 The DPRK has already declared its determination to blow up anti-DPRK confrontation and plot-breeding bases such as Chongwadae, cesspool of all evils.
					
					 All those who kick up a "human rights" racket against the DPRK to hurt its dignity and social system, conservative ruling forces included, deserve stern punishment.
					
					 The tense situation on the Korean Peninsula will be defused only when the plot-breeding bases of the puppet regime are reduced to ashes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. Planned Deployment of THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. Planned Deployment of THAAD in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has buckled down to establishing a missile defense system while getting vocal about "missile threat" from the DPRK.
					 The U.S. is taking issue with the DPRK's war deterrence, a manifestation of a cynical ploy to cover up its provocative nature, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 A typical example is THAAD, the core of MD whose deployment in south Korea is being pushed forward by the U.S.
					
					 The puppet authorities are trumpeting about south Korea's own development of MD, while asserting the MD deployment in the U.S. military bases is irrelevant to them.
					
					 But it is not secret that south Korea's MD development is part of the U.S. missile shield policy.
					
					 The U.S. deployed strategic and tactical weapons that evoked sensitive response from the public in the past in its military bases only to stealthily hand them over to south Korea after the public uproar became calm.
					
					 The U.S. seems to employ the same trick this time.
					
					 The deployment of THAAD in south Korea amounts to inviting a nuclear disaster. 
					
					 The ultimate goal sought by the U.S. through the deployment of THAAD in south Korea is to militarily contain big powers around the Korean peninsula and hold hegemony in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 It is quite natural that Russia and China are showing sensitive response.
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the U.S. much-touted "missile threat" from the DPRK is aimed to introduce nuclear war means to south Korea, build a missile shield and ignite a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses True Colors of U.S. as Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses True Colors of U.S. as Worst Human Rights Abuser
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A New York grand jury recently decided not to indict the white police officer in the death of unarmed black man Eric Garner who was put into a fatal chokehold amid nationwide protests in the U.S. -- demonstrations still raging in response to Ferguson case. This is clear evidence of the reactionary and corrupt nature of the value concepts on American style human rights and human rights system there. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says this in a commentary. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Upset by the Garner's case, officials of the U.S. Administration and New York City authorities vied each other to brand the case as a deed of an individual police officer. However, this is nothing but a trick to cover up the reactionary nature of the American style human rights system. 
					
					 Grievous deaths of black people by the U.S. police are inevitable products of the deep-rooted racial discrimination policy. 
					
					 It is by no means accidental that grand juries decided not to bring any charges against the white police officers involved in the death cases. 
					
					 In essence, it is little short of encouraging the police to kill more black people in the future as killing of black people is not a subject of legal action. 
					
					 There is no other country in the world but the U.S. where colored people are not treated as human beings and their human rights are wantonly abused. 
					
					 The U.S. is styling itself a "model country of human rights," becoming increasingly vocal about "protection of human rights" and "improvement of human rights" in other countries. This is a tragicomedy that makes the boiled head of a cow provoke a side-splitting laughter.

articles.title: S. Korean Politics Reigned by Some Privileged Heavyweights
articles.content:
S. Korean Politics Reigned by Some Privileged Heavyweights
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Disclosures are being made one after another of the facts that Jong Yun Hoe and other confidents of the chief executive of south Korea are interfering in politics to throw the political landscape into a mayhem.
					 In September last year the director of the sports department and the head of the sports policy office of the ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism were replaced all of a sudden by others although that time was not a season for personnel reshuffle. It aroused public skepticism at home and abroad.
					
					 As regards it, Ryu Jin Ryong, minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, disclosed that the replacement was made at the instructions of Chongwadae and Park Geun Hye, in particular.
					
					 According to his assertion, the above-said replaced men made a survey of a riding association at that time.
					
					 What mattered was the result of the survey which was contrary to Jong's intention.
					
					 Upset by it, Jong gave Park a shot in the arm to call Ryu in August last year and chide the above-said personnel as "bad guys," issuing an instruction to replace them.
					
					 Ryu, affirming the correctness of his assertion, talked about Chongwadae's no comment on it.
					
					 His disclosure sparked off a great sensation in the south Korean political camp.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the fact that Jong had been locked in a scramble for power against Park Geun Hye's younger brother Park Ji Man in the political camp was disclosed.
					
					 Park Geun Hye tries to hush up the case, denying the relations between Jong and her brother.
					
					 All facts clearly show the true picture of corrupt Chongwadae.

articles.title: Poor Situation of S. Korean Youth
articles.content:
Poor Situation of S. Korean Youth
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Strange trend is sweeping south Korea. 
					 According to the south Korean CBS report on Dec. 6, clothes-stalls in the street outside Hongik University in Seoul had disappeared in one or two years to be replaced by fortune-telling stalls.
					
					 It was reported that jobless young people in their 20s and 30s visit those stalls with hope. The number has shown rapid increase recently. 
					
					 Experts say this reflects uneasiness of young people with rare opportunity of employment. 
					
					 The CBS deplored the poor situation of the young people. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities press for privatization while resorting to the pro-plutocrats policy. As a result, human rights of the south Koreans have been wantonly abused through massive layoff under the pretext of restructuring. 
					
					 This casts clouds over the vital rights of millions of young people including university graduates, especially those on the eve of their graduation.

articles.title: Earthquake Hits South Jolla Province of S. Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits South Jolla Province of S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A magnitude 3.3 earthquake hit Posong County of South Jolla Province on Dec. 8, according to south Korean KBS. 
					 The epicenter was located at 8 km southeast of the county. 
					
					 It was reported that buildings shook in Sunchon and Ryosu of South Jolla Province and some areas of North Jolla Province.

articles.title: Korean Scholar in U.S. Praises Exploits of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Korean Scholar in U.S. Praises Exploits of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Korean scholar Sonu Hak Won praised the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il for the country and the revolution when interviewed by Minjok Thongsin, internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S. on Dec. 6. 
					 He said:
					
					 Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK Kim Jong Il saw to it that the north-south joint declarations were made public to pave the wide avenue for independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 The special exploit of Kim Jong Il was that he embodied patriotism. He was a peerless patriot who made the people of the DPRK ardently love things their own, and his patriotism was based on the Juche idea. 
					
					 It is the great exploit that he scientifically systemized the Juche idea created by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power and military power and decisively defeated the U.S. imperialists' moves for aggression by pursuing Songun politics. 
					
					 He saw to it that the DPRK had access to nuclear deterrence and put the dignity of the nation on the highest stage. Indeed, NDC Chairman Kim Jong Il performed undying great exploits. 
					
					 The Korean nation will surely win victory when it advances along the way indicated by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Great Exploits Praised by Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Great Exploits Praised by Korean in U.S.
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S., carried an article contributed by Korean in the U.S. Hyon Jun Gi on the occasion of the third anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise. 
					 The article said Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, provided north-south summits the first of its kind in the history of national division to have the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration adopted as a landmark indicating the way for national reunification. 
					
					 He developed the Juche idea and pursued the Songun politics to get all the service personnel and people united close around the ranks in single mind, the article said, and went on:
					
					 With the steel-like pluck and guts Kim Jong Il protected sovereignty of the DPRK in the standoff with the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, and put the DPRK on a position of politico-ideological power and military power. 
					
					 He created a new history of music-based policies by combining the progressive music art with politics. 
					
					 All the Korean people are closely united around Marshal Kim Jong Un though Kim Jong Il suddenly passed away. This makes people deeply realize once again the greatness of the exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Polish Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Polish Body
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Having a Correct Understanding of Nationalism" was posted on a website by the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on Dec. 5.
					 The work, published in February Juche 91 (2002), deals with the birth and essence of nationalism and the past view on it and an important issue arising in achieving independent development of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was brought out in booklet by Vladivostok Vit Publishing House of Russia on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.
					 The work, published on March 1, Juche 82 (1993), deals with the reactionary nature and absurdity of the sophism of the imperialists and renegades of socialism condemning socialism as "totalitarian", "barrack-like" and "administrative and domineering" one.
					
					 The work also clarifies the principled issues arising in defending and protecting the socialist cause and accomplishing it to the last, including the issues of making socialism a faith and morality and giving full play to its advantages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Roundtable talks took place in Vietnam, Indonesia, Angola and the Czech Republic from Nov. 27 to Dec. 3 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 Those talks were attended by personages from all social strata of those countries.
					
					 The curator of Ho Chi Minh Museum said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il will always be alive in the hearts of the world progressives including the Korean people and the Vietnamese people.
					
					 My visit to the DPRK helped me keenly realize how great the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed for the Korean revolution and the people's happiness is and how boundlessly the Korean people and all other world progressives revere him.
					
					 We will give wide publicity to the feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by various forms and ways in the future, too.
					
					 Personages including a county governor in Angola said the successful launch of satellite and other amazing successes in the DPRK are a brilliant fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, adding his revolutionary cause has been steadily carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party said that it was thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il that the DPRK has pushed forward the socialist construction with great national power.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to the cause of global independence with his firm faith in socialism and revolutionary principle and through his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in UK and Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in UK and Peru
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- British and Peruvian organizations posted special write-ups on their websites on Dec. 2 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il Maintained Socialist Principle" with his photo.
					
					 The article said: 
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great leader who inherited the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and defended socialism despite adversities. 
					
					 He was the only person in the world who held fast to the banner of socialism in such difficult situation. 
					
					 He authored many works including "Socialism Is a Science" and "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" to clarify not only the cause and lesson from the frustration of socialism in some countries but scientific accuracy and lawfulness of the victory of socialism.
					
					 His works serve as guidelines most valuable for the revolutionary people following socialism. 
					
					 He beat back the imperialists' ever-increasing moves to stifle the DPRK and provided a turning point for building a thriving socialist country. He turned the DPRK into a fortress of human cause of independence.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted articles titled "Third Anniversary of Demise of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il" and "Mt. Paektu and Kim Jong Il".
					
					 The articles praised his noble revolutionary career in which he made undying exploits for the country, people and times and history under the banner of Juche and Songun.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A remembrance rally was held by Funcinpec Party of Cambodia, roundtable talks, film show and book and photo exhibition by Iran－Korea Friendship Magsal Agro－Stock Farm, and book and photo exhibitions at Kuala Lumpur Complex Selangor building of  Malaysia and by Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia from Nov. 15 to 26 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos showing revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos dealing with the reality of the DPRK that undergoes change beyond recognition day by day.
					
					 The participants in the film show watched Korean film "Reply of Korea".
					
					 Attending the events were personages and people from all social strata of those countries.
					
					 The deputy secretaries general of the Funcinpec Party of Cambodia praised Kim Jong Il, who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people, as the supreme incarnation of moral obligation who saw to it that Kim Il Sung was held in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 They also said that Kim Jong Il consolidated and developed the long-standing friendly relations between the two countries and always found himself among the people, making a continuous journey for the people all his life. They added that he will always be remembered by progressive mankind.
					
					 A Malaysian personage said great are the feats of Kim Jong Il who protected the sovereignty of the DPRK despite the imperialists' vicious moves to stifle it.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries on Dec. 2 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a seminar on exploits and film show held by the French committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il, a remembrance meeting and book exhibition by the Ecuadorian committee for honoring the memory of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and round-table talks and seminar on exploits by the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru and Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books dealing with their personalities as great men and books introducing the real picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants of the film show watched Korean films documenting the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Guy Dupre, vice-chairman of the French committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il, and Benoit Quennedey, vice-president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, praised the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed by firmly guaranteeing peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world with his original Songun politics.
					
					 Daniel Alvarez Celi, chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, said that Kim Jong Il was a prominent thinker and theoretician and great politician who performed great exploits on behalf of humankind with his unique Songun politics, holding aloft the banner of Juche idea, the idea guiding the era of independence.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru who doubles as chairman of the Peruvian committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il, stressed that Kim Jong Il's greatest exploit was that he developed the DPRK into an invincible country which is standing firm against the U.S. styling itself the "world's only superpower.

articles.title: Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by Polish Branch of KFA
articles.content:
Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by Polish Branch of KFA
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a statement on Dec. 5 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Exploits of Kim Jong Il are cherished deep in mind of not only the Korean people but also the progressive mankind.
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided a reliable guarantee for the prosperity of the nation by enforcing the original Songun politics.
					
					 He regarded it as his lifelong maxim to believe in the people as in heaven, always found himself among the people and dedicated his all to the Korean revolution and the happiness of the people till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 Since he started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, he foiled all the challenges of reactionaries to check the advance of the Korean people and built Korean style popular masses-centered socialism based on the Juche idea.
					
					 He successfully carried forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung and put forward the Korean People's Army as a pillar and driving force in the drive for defending the sovereignty of the country, achieving the prosperity of the nation and protecting socialism, regarding it as a basic guarantee for the victory of revolution and construction to bolster up military capabilities.
					
					 The exploits he performed for the revolutionary cause of Songun and the human cause of independence will shine long in history.
					
					 We pay the highest tribute to him.

articles.title: Foreign Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Foreign Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups illustrated with portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					 The December issue of the German paper Rote Fahne carried articles under the headline "Comrade Kim Jong Il and development of Korea".
					
					 The paper referred in detail to the fact that Kim Jong Il performed immortal feats on behalf of the party and the revolution, the country and its people, regarding the accomplishment of the cause of President Kim Il Sung as his lifelong mission.
					
					 The November-December issue of the Bulgarian paper Iskra carried an article titled "Third anniversary of demise of great Comrade Kim Jong Il."
					
					 It said: Kim Jong Il led the Korean people in their struggle for building socialism for a long period since he started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He resolutely overcame all sorts of difficulties and challenges with his matchless courage and firmly defended socialism.
					
					 He clarified the truth that socialism is a science and the victory of socialism is an inevitability of history.
					
					 The DPRK had access to nuclear deterrence for self-defence to protect the sovereignty of the country, the dignity of the people and socialism from the evermore undisguised nuclear threat of the U.S.
					
					 A landmark event took place in the development of the north-south relations and the struggle for achieving the country's reunification thanks to Kim Jong Il's noble patriotism and his energetic leadership.  As a result, historic north-south summits took place and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, were adopted.
					
					 Under the title "Third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il", the Polish branch of the Association for Friendship with the Korean People on Dec. 3 posted articles praising his immortal feats for the cause of global independence on its internet homepage.

articles.title: MINREX critica intento de EE.UU. de remitir al Consejo de Seguridad el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX critica intento de EE.UU. de remitir al Consejo de Seguridad el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos intenta presentar oficialmente al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU el "problema de DDHH" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC se entrevisto el dia 9 con la ACNC y dio la siguiente respuesta:
					EE.UU. intenta usar otra vez el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en el cumplimiento de su politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					El pasado dia 5, EE.UU. y algunas fuerzas seguidoras del CS enviaron a nombre comun al presidente de esta entidad una carta que demanda presentar oficialmente al CS el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC.
					
					?Por que EE.UU. se apresura a remitir ese asunto al CS aun antes de que concluyeran los tramites de aprobacion en la Asamblea General de la ONU de la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC, inventada ilegalmente con sus satelites?
					
					Es que EE.UU. esta desesperado para hacer hecho consumado la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC usando todos los medios y metodos por el temor a que ese fraude politico sea denunciado y repudiado por la humanidad.
					
					Esto es otra accion cinica que puede cometer solo ese pais bandido que utiliza los escenarios de la ONU en sus fines agresivos mediante la coercion, despotismo y fraude.
					
					A pesar de que existe en la ONU el Consejo de DDHH especializado en este asunto, EE.UU. intenta llevar obstinadamente al CS el "problema DDHH" de la RPDC con el fin de preparar el pretexto de agresion militar.
					
					En el discurso hecho en la Asamblea General de la ONU de este ano, la RPDC senalo que el CS debe dejar de ser la exhibicion del climax de la pauta de doble rasero y la tribuna de embustes.
					
					Cuando el gobierno de la RPDC presento formalmente en julio pasado el problema de cesar los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea que peligran directamente la paz y la seguridad internacionales, el CS no lo ha escuchado.
					
					Si tal CS somete a la discusion el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC, enajenado de la seguridad, por ser demandado por EE.UU. y sus satelites, eso sera el climax de la pauta de doble rasero.
					
					Discutir ese tema en el CS a base del prejuiciado, fraudulento y no verificado "informe de la comision de investigacion" sobre la situacion de derechos humanos de la RPDC significa la conversion de esa instancia en una tribuna que aborda los documentos falsos.
					
					Se reproduce hoy el peligroso precedente de hace 11 anos cuando el secretario de Estado de EE.UU. busco el pretexto de la guerra de agresion con las palabras manipuladas de que "en Irak hay armas de exterminio masivo".
					
					Si quieren debatir el problema de DDHH, no deben tratar el "informe" inventado sin ver la realidad de la RPDC siquiera sino han de cuestionar primero los actos de violacion de DDHH que frecuentan en EE.UU.
					
					?Por que se hace vista gorda de las torturas inhumanas de la Agencia Central de Inteligencia y de los actos violadores de DDHH de los policias blancos norteamericanos que matan a los negros tirando y sofocando, de lo cual expreso seria preocupacion el comite anti-torturas de la ONU a traves de su informe de investigacion e hizo referencia el reporte de 6 mil paginas del comite de inteligencia del senado del Congreso norteamericano?
					
					Si el CS aborda el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC sin tratar todos los problemas urgentes relacionados directamente con la paz y seguridad internacionales y haciendo vista gorda de la critica situacion de DDHH de EE.UU., su miembro permanente, eso comprobara su naturaleza como herramienta de coercion de EE.UU.
					
					El acto hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y sus satelites que abusan del CS, producira graves consecuencias y la responsabilidad recaera enteramente sobre esos provocadores.

articles.title: Premier coreano averigua gestiones de la Mina de Unryul
articles.content:
Premier coreano averigua gestiones de la Mina de Unryul
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno las labores de la Mina de Unryul.
					Se entero en detalles del estado de produccion y evacuacion del esteril y las perspectivas de extraccion recorriendo la galeria de extraccion, la planta de concentracion y otros lugares y convoco la reunion consultiva.
					
					En la ocasion fueron debatidos los remedios para aumentar la cantidad de extraccion de mineral, concentrar las fuerzas en la evacuacion del esteril y elevar la ley de mineral.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier estuvo en  la Mina de Jaeryong donde tomo las medidas para el suministro de electricidad a ella.

articles.title: Efectuado seminario sobre ciencias y tecnicas cosmicas
articles.content:
Efectuado seminario sobre ciencias y tecnicas cosmicas
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 10 en la Universidad Kim Il Sung el seminario sobre las ciencias y tecnicas cosmicas con la participacion de los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos y profesores de la Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Espacial, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, el Ministerio de Comunicaciones, el Ministerio de Industria Pesquera, la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica y otras unidades.
					El seminario persigue el objetivo de elevar al nivel mas alto en un corto tiempo las ciencias y tecnicas espaciales del pais a traves de la presentacion de las disertaciones sobre la teoria basica de ciencias y tecnicas espaciales tales como la tecnica de fabricacion y lanzamiento de satelite artificial y el cohete de transporte y del intercambio de ciencias academicas.
					
					En el seminario las unidades de las ramas de investigacion cientifica y educacion, los comites, ministerios y organos centrales expusieron centenares de tesis. 
					
					Se distinguen las disertaciones que narran con profundidad las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un ante el desarrollo de ciencias cosmicas del pais y la justeza de la politica de desarrollo espacial del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y las otras que explican de manera juridica la justeza del desarrollo del espacio a fines pacificos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Ademas se dieron a conocer las valiosas tesis que narran de manera cientifica y teorica los problemas que surgen en fabricar los cohetes de transporte de satelite, el satelite de observacion de la tierra y el otro de comunicaciones de valor practico.
					
					Fueron evaluadas altamente decenas de disertaciones que tienen una gran importancia en analizar los asuntos a ser resueltos con urgencia en la rama de las ciencias y tecnicas espaciales.

articles.title: ACNC comenta el incidente de Ferguson
articles.content:
ACNC comenta el incidente de Ferguson
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, las autoridades judiciales de Missouri de Estados Unidos decidieron no acusar al policia blanco quien en agosto pasado, mato a tiros a un muchacho negro.
					Esta decision demuestra claramente a todo el mundo que EE.UU., que preconiza tanto la "defensa de los derechos humanos" y la "igualdad de todas las personas", es la tierra privada de derechos humanos y el reino de discriminacion racial. 
					
					La discriminacion racial en Estados Unidos se agrava cada vez mas. 
					
					En esa sociedad tenebrosa los negros sufren la discriminacion racial, la falta de derechos politicos, la penuria y los maltratos y viven con el panico al fusilamiento.
					
					Los incidentes sucesivos de fusilamiento a los negros son desastres y actos de violacion de DDHH causados por las autoridades estadounidenses. 
					
					Bajo el amparo abierto de las autoridades, los policias encargados de la seguridad del pais matan a golpetazos a los negros a plena luz del dia. 
					
					Con motivo del incidente de Ferguson, se desarrollan en mas de 170 ciudades norteamericanas las protestas contra la politica racista. En tal circunstancia, en otra ciudad un policia mato a tiros a un adolescente negro revelando otra vez el caracter corrupto de la sociedad norteamericana. 
					
					Los asesinatos de negros por policias blancos es la caza de negros de version moderna. 
					
					Las fuentes extranjeras comentan que son mas los negros muertos a manos de los policias que los asesinados por los gangsteres o narcotraficantes. 
					
					Sin embargo, no se castigan los policias en los casos de asesinato ocurridos por el abuso del poder. 
					
					Hasta Obama, afrodescendiente elegido como presidente prometiendo resolver el problema de desigualdad racial, dice que EE.UU. es el pais fundado segun la ley y se debe acatar la decision de las autoridades judiciales. Como se ve, en EE.UU., autodenominado como "defensor de derechos humanos", no se cambia nunca la politica racista aunque se cambie su presidente. 
					
					Ahora el incidente de Ferguson afecta mucho la "diplomacia de derechos humanos" de EE.UU. que presenta como meta diplomatica la "divulgacion del valor de derechos humanos y democracia". 
					
					La sociedad internacional y la prensa mundial lo protestan como "un incidente de desigualdad que mancha el prestigio de EE.UU. que se creia campeon en la defensa de DDHH" y "climax de la cronica discriminacion racial de la sociedad estadounidense". 
					
					El 28 de noviembre pasado, el comite anti-torturas de la ONU urgio a EE.UU. a investigar el abuso del poder y la reaccion excesiva de la policia contra las minorias. 
					
					Es natural la internacionalizacion del problema de discriminacion racial de EE.UU. 
					
					Pero, el gobierno norteamericano no toma ninguna contramedida. 
					
					Mientras que existan el problematico sistema de derechos humanos y la discriminacion racial arraigada en la sociedad estadounidense, se repetira el incidente de Ferguson en EE.UU. 
					
					Es muy ridiculo que EE.UU. tilde de "violadores de derechos humanos" a los paises que mantienen el regimen y el modo politico propios. 
					
					EE.UU. debe aceptar con sinceridad las criticas unanimes de la sociedad internacional y resolver primero el problema de derechos humanos de casa.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta otro caso de impunidad de policia blanco asesino de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta otro caso de impunidad de policia blanco asesino de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Aun antes de que se calmaran las repercusiones del incidente de Ferguson en Estados Unidos, las autoridades judiciales neoyorquinas decidieron no acusar al policia blanco que estrangulo a un hombre negro.
					Esto es otra prueba evidente del caracter reaccionario y corrupto de la concepcion del valor y el regimen de DDHH al estilo estadounidense.
					
					Asi critica el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					En su artimana para encubrir la naturaleza reaccionaria del sistema de DDHH al estilo estadounidense, las perplejas figuras oficiales de la administracion norteamericana y de Nueva Cork describen el susodicho caso como acto de algunos policias.
					
					La muerte injusta de los negros a mano de los policias norteamericanos es producto inevitable de la arraigada politica de discriminacion racial.
					
					La impunidad concedida a los policias matones da lo mismo que instigarlos a asesinar a mas negros.
					
					En el mundo no hay otro pais como EE.UU. que viola flagrantemente los derechos humanos de las razas de color.
					
					Es una tragicomedia que ese peor violador de DDHH abogara tanto por la "proteccion y el mejoramiento de DDHH" en otros paises portandose como "Estado modelo de DDHH" a la vista de todo el mundo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza insistencia de EE.UU. en "amenaza" de RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza insistencia de EE.UU. en "amenaza" de RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Ahora Estados Unidos recurre con frenesi al establecimiento del sistema antimisiles hablando tanto de la "amenaza de misil" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					En un comentario individual de este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de una artimana para encubrir su naturaleza provocativa y continua: 
					
					Lo prueba el emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos propagan ruidosamente sobre el desarrollo independiente del sistema de defensa antimisil diciendo que el emplazamiento del sistema antimisiles en las bases militares norteamericanas no tiene nada que ver con ellos mismos. 
					
					Pero, ya no es un secreto que el desarrollo independiente del sistema antimisiles del Sur de Corea es un eslabon del sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. 
					
					En el pasado, EE.UU. ubicaba en sus bases militares en suelo surcoreano los armamentos estrategicos y tacticos, y despues de apaciguada la opinion publica, los entregaba sigilosamente a los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					De misma manera, intenta entregar THAAD a  los titeres surcoreanos con la meta final de mantener a rayas a las potencias perifericas de la Peninsula Coreana y tomar la hegemonia sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico.  
					
					Es natural que Rusia y China se opongan a ello. 
					
					La realidad demuestra que la insistencia de EE.UU. en "amenaza de misil" de la RPDC persigue el objetivo de introducir los pertrechos de guerra nuclear en suelo surcoreano y establecer el sistema antimisiles y a la larga, provocar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico.
